title: "BIOL 275 Biostatistics"
---

## Course Overview

This course introduces core concepts in biostatistics with an emphasis on data literacy, reproducible analysis, and interpretation of biological data. Students will work with real datasets using R and develop skills applicable across biology, ecology, and environmental science.

This website serves as the **public hub** for course materials.

## Course Information

Instructor: Chris Merkord

Institution: Minnesota State University Moorhead

Term: Spring 2026

Delivery: In-person lecture and lab

Software: R, RStudio, Posit Cloud (introductory use)
